00036 #include <math.h>
00037 #include "LInfTemplate.hpp"
00038 #include "QualityMetric.hpp"
00039 #include "MsqError.hpp"

00041 namespace MESQUITE_NS {

00044 LInfTemplate::LInfTemplate(QualityMetric *qualitymetric)
00045   : ObjectiveFunctionTemplate(qualitymetric) {}

00053 ObjectiveFunction* LInfTemplate::clone() const
00054   { return new LInfTemplate(get_quality_metric()); }
00055   
00056 void LInfTemplate::clear()
00057   { }
00058 
00059 bool LInfTemplate::evaluate( EvalType type, 
00060                              PatchData& pd,
00061                              double& value_out,
00062                              bool free,
00063                              MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   if (type != ObjectiveFunction::CALCULATE) {
00066     MSQ_SETERR(err)(
00067       "LInfTemplate does not support block coodinate descent algoritms",
00068       MsqError::INVALID_STATE );
00069     return false;
00070   }
00071 
00072   QualityMetric* qm = get_quality_metric();
00073   qm->get_evaluations( pd, qmHandles, free, err );  MSQ_ERRFALSE(err);
00074   const double negate = qm->get_negate_flag();
00075   
00076     // calculate OF value for just the patch
00077   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator i;
00078   double value;
00079   value_out = -HUGE_VAL;
00080   for (i = qmHandles.begin(); i != qmHandles.end(); ++i)
00081   {
00082     bool result = qm->evaluate( pd, *i, value, err );
00083     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !result)
00084       return false;
00085 
00086     value = negate * fabs(value);
00087     if (value > value_out)
00088       value_out = value;
00089   }
00090   
00091   return true;
00092 }
